name: Data Quality Overall Score calculations
content:
Overall Score Calculation for Data Quality


  • Pass Percentage

For a specific check (or node), calculate the % of valid rows:

passPercentage = (goodcount / totalcount) * 100;

  • Total Percentage

Summing the weighted contribution of each check:

totalPercentage += passPercentage * weight;

  • Total Weight

Summing the weights across all checks.

weight1+weight2+weight3

  • Overall Score:

Computing the weighted average:

overallScore = totalPercentage / totalWeight;
